about_the_game:
Fed up with your staff looking like professionals? Well, inject a bit of vim, a squeeze of vigour, and a blast of class into your hospital attire!

It’s time to pull back the dressing room curtain on some of the fanciest frockery in town. Welcome, kind people, to the snappily named “Two Point Hospital: Fancy Dress Pack”.

Mesmerise your patients by diagnosing them as a wizard! Shock the staff room by sauntering in as a fish! Or horrify everyone by walking out of the toilet dressed as a zombie!
Whatever you’re after, whether it be tangy outfits or outrageous headwear, we have something to tickle your fancy.

Here’s what’s included!

Outfits:


  • Scurvy Dog
  • Dying Trend
  • Something Fishy
  • Groovy Garb
  • Disco Shawl
  • Leisure Flare
  • Spicy Smock
  • Roman Scandal
  • Penguin Suit

Headwear:


  • Horse Head
  • Wolf Wear
  • Horny Helmet
  • Wizard Chops
  • Bunny Ears
  • Bev Brain
  • Masquerade Masque
  • Mask of Mystery

Items:


  • Tombola
  • Cake Sale
  • Coin Drop
  • Wall Dressing
  • Hat Stand
  • Costume Chest

It’s time to pull back the dressing room curtain on some of the fanciest frockery in town. Welcome, kind people, to the snappily named “Two Point Hospital: Fancy Dress Pack”.

Mesmerise your patients by diagnosing them as a wizard! Shock the staff room by sauntering in as a fish! Or horrify everyone by walking out of the toilet dressed as a zombie!
Whatever you’re after, whether it be tangy outfits or outrageous headwear, we have something to tickle your fancy.

linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04/Steam OS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6600 or AMD Ryzen 1600x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060, 3 GB (Legacy: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 780, 4GB) or AMD RX 580, 4 GB (Legacy: AMD R9 290X, 4GB )
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: DirectX Version 11

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13
  • Processor: i5 8259U 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 775M, 2 GB , AMD Radeon 555, 2 GB, Intel Iris Plus 655
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13
  • Processor: i5 3.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 570
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

  • Processor: Intel Core i3 6100 or AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT 1030, 2GB (Legacy: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460), AMD RX550, 2GB (Legacy: AMD Radeon HD 6850), Integrated: Intel HD Graphics 630
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
